Question: This person led his 6th game-winning drive of the season and the Colts pulled away 31–21.
Hints: This person passed for 194 yards and a touchdown in the loss.
In a 2012 interview, Star Wars novelist Drew Karpyshyn named this person the NFL personality most likely to become a Jedi Knight.
This person and former Colts wide receiver Marvin Harrison hold a number of QB-WR tandem records:.
